item.title: Runescape exp?
item.dc:creator: @Terrordog Terrordog
item.description:
@Terrordog wrote:

Setting the exp exactly the same like in real runescape?

in this format

[code]
public int getXPForLevel(int level) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= level; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		if (lvl >= level) {
			return output;
		}
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
	}
	return 0;
}

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
	int points = 0;
	int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
			return lvl;
		}
	}
	return 99;
}[/code]

Read full topic
